website_summaries.verdict: Stands at the top of our short list for features, quality, and versatility.
pros: Versatile machine with capacity to make three blended drinks at one time
Ideal for parties and large gatherings
cons: The unit is large and takes up a lot of space
It is also costlier than some of the other models tested

customer_reviews.title: A Vitamix will work better
customer_reviews.text: Although I enjoy using my Margaritaville Tahiti machine, the pitchers are cheap and leaked after 6 months of use. I can't seem to get replacement pitchers anywhere. When I call the manufacturer directly, I don't really get any answers about when and if replacement pitchers will ever become available. You cannot use the machine without the pitchers. At this point I have a $500 doorstop. Spend the money on a Vitamix. They stand behind their product and it blends better than this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice during summer (loved it) by Fall, ice dispenser was not working. Troubleshooting/taking top apart fixed it, used once again and it happened again the following time.. have had it 2 yrs, used only 3 times. Sadly bad advertisement for 100 guests at a party when product not working. Maybe buy the single and save yourself hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Olander

customer_reviews.title: Be ware!
customer_reviews.text: Only the middle blender works as how the commercial states. The left and right blender does not blend properly. One is too watery and the other dispense to much ice. I try to return the item but was unable because it was pass 30 days. Do not purchase your better off with a regular blender.
customer_reviews.author: NOEMI RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!!! I love love love this machine!!! It is a solid piece of equipment and large. I keep in a cabinet when not in use. It works great and the recipes are easy to follow and turn out great. Clean up is not bad but I am very careful to take it apart and thoroughly clean it. When we have had parties, the first thing my friends ask is if I'm bringing out my margarita machine. Its a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: My one complaint is that it's not made with cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: My one complaint is that it's not made with cleaning in mind. The bases the pitchers sit on get very sticky and should be able to be washed. I have to get a swab or a cloth and knife tip to get all the mess out of the crevices.
customer_reviews.author: VGold

customer_reviews.title: Fun at first but doesn’t hold up to just occasional use
customer_reviews.text: After having this machine for 2 wonderful years, the rotating assembly suddenly stopped working. I now have to manually move the ice chute between jars. It’s of course now out of warranty and I was told I could ship it to Canada for diagnostic at my expense. I’m soo disappointed. This was the centerpiece of any gathering I had for 2 years, now I’m embarrassed to take it out and am always asked why I have to constantly force the ice chute back and forth for it to work. There is apparently no way to take the upper assembly apart other than the ice container to clean the shaving blade. What a bust!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box one of the pitchers was missing and two that where in the box where cracked at the base. Had to return before even using very upset. Tried to contract the company and no response
customer_reviews.author: Chris Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best drink maker ever!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite drink machine!! I own 2 other Margaritaville machines but I love the size of this one. It looks so classy. I leave it out on the bar and get compliments about its look. Once drinks start flowing the real beauty shows. It automatically revolves to the side you want it’s great for parties! If you haven’t seen the video for this...it’s a must!! Amazon had the lowest price and it was in stock!
customer_reviews.author: MsMgmt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I love my machine. It rarely gets used but it looks good on my bar. It's a bit messier than I had hoped though. I find evidence of "splash" in every nook and cranny. Overall, it works well. I think a regular blender would do just a well, if not better. This thing is more so a "conversation piece." Good for those who entertain a lot.
customer_reviews.author: BabyBison2000

customer_reviews.title: Great drinks and entertaining to watch. Perfect for snow cones for our grandkids too
customer_reviews.text: This machine was the hit of our party! It works great and the drink recipes are amazing. Some comments were it wasn't easy to clean, but we found if you put water and a little dish soap in each one and push button down to blend it cleans it great!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Not the most user friendly device
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really cool looking machine, and some features on it like the shaved ice is cool, but it’s not easy to use. It makes a huge mess anytime you use it, and it does not make very slushy drinks unless you put more shaved ice in. The reservoir for the melted ice is too small and if you do not dump it will overflow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one drink at a time, not a full carafe at a time
customer_reviews.text: This product chops ice great mixes different drinks in each container, But, will Only mix one drink at a time. That’s right the total volume of one drink can be mixed in each carafe at a single time. I bought this thinking I could blend for a larger gathering, Oh was I wrong. This worked painfully slow. Went back to my Ninja to make the bulk of the drinks. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Munholland

customer_reviews.title: By Far Best Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: By far the best gift I’ve ever gotten, very industrial and I make margarita all the time just like at restaurants! I love, love this, it’s easy to use, easy to clean! You can make three pitcher size drinks at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again! Delicious and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I stalked this product for nearly a year but was not willing to spend the money. I saw that Amazon had a "like new" product for considerably less and decided to take a chance. I could not have been more pleased with my purchase. The box was in beautiful shape, every piece was sealed and packaged like new. I've used it every day of this long weekend and its a dream. I don't splurge often, but so grateful I took the chance on this like new item.
customer_reviews.author: HobiesGirl

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best purchase I have made in sometime. This machine was actually the life of the party. Everyone was fascinated with how easy it was to use and great the drinks where.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Bourque

customer_reviews.title: Every home should have one!
customer_reviews.text: If this was a "built-in," I'm sure home values would climb. It did take some practice to get the various parts working together, and getting the mix just right. But once we mastered it, this was the life of the party during a beach week.
customer_reviews.author: The R's

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price, works even better than the single one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Machine
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this one. Its super easy to use and I love being able to have 3 flavors / drinks mixed up (if you want)
customer_reviews.author: Jody Goad

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We had so much fun using the margaritaville. It was amazing watching it blend our drinks. Easy to clean and use. It is a big appliance so make room for it. I think every home bar should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Kirklin

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It is very easy to use and was a big hit at my luau party. I’m looking forward to using it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hood

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in transit
customer_reviews.text: Love the machine but it was cracked in a couple places but we hope it holds up. we are still going to use it because we paid a lot for it and we needed it right away
customer_reviews.author: angela davis

customer_reviews.title: Need bigger pitchers
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve read it clearly because the pitcher size is small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. but if you only want to make one drink you have to do it manually and the auto feature only blends a full pitcher. If it had the option for 1 to 4 serving options I would have giving this a 5 star. In either case it is still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Tahiti
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender for my daiquiri shop. I use it to make virgin drinks. Love that you can still work it while the one or two blenders are being washed. Also love how you can fill a glass of shaved ice without any of the blender containers attached. Everyone is very impressed when they see it. Great quality. Impressive/profession looking.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: it is so fun to make drinks with this machine! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fun and functional.
customer_reviews.text: We love our margarita machine. We use it everyday, mostly to make protein fruit smoothies. When having friends over, it’s awesome for all the fun alcohol drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Only thing that would make it better is a bigger reservoir tank. Water ends up all over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my home without realizing how large it was. This is definitely more for a restaurant or huge parties
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl LaRosa

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. We had to play around with the recipes ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. We had to play around with the recipes a few times, especially the volumes. It's easy to put too much mix in and have it overflow when it adds the ice. But we figured it out pretty quickly and it has been a huge hit at our summer pool parties.
customer_reviews.author: J. Staley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we hoped for and beyond! So far we're loving it! Made couple of drinks already:) Loved how you can make multiple drinks at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Party dream....
customer_reviews.text: A bit confusing at first but it is a pretty nice system once you figure out all the directions. Makes a great Margarita.
customer_reviews.author: bsnydersvc

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this machine
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine! I had the single margaritaville and when I actually watched the video of how this works I had to buy it! You can make 3 pitchers of your favorite frozen beverage at once! It helps cut down the time when you have a crowd! I only wish I could find a travel bag for it!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine and so does my son! We make slushies with it and it's perfect! I love the 3 large size pitchers that you can use to make 3 different drinks. It's super easy to use and fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for family young and old
customer_reviews.text: It allows our family to enjoy a nice refreshing drink without the hassle of multiple blenders and other items. Cool item
customer_reviews.author: Terry D.

customer_reviews.title: a blast
customer_reviews.text: this is great for family get togethers in the summer or milk shake nights. My wife and I have had it for a while now and my son and nephews just love it, so does my father in law. There is no delay 3 people can make their own drinks they way they want at once.
customer_reviews.author: Raevaghn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Margaritaville Tahiti mixer it makes awesome perfect dreams and milkshakes for my kids you around.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Parties
customer_reviews.text: This is just fantastic. Not only is it great at what it does, it is a good conversation piece as well. It will take a couple of trys to get the mixes where you want them. We have had this a year and it is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to Summer!
customer_reviews.text: I know it's fairly expensive, but it's worth every penny. Easy to use, easy to clean, and everybody loves it! It works well with pre-made mixes or your own recipes. It is a great looking machine also. It is larger than I thought it would be, which means more drink capacity! Just don't forget to run any extra ice out of the resevoir, or you could be wiping up a little water in the morning. I HIGHLY recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ChubbyW

customer_reviews.title: Cost more than product need to cost.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a family celebration easy to use and clean Only on some recipe not all ice blended. Difficult to remove any ice not used from the reservoir
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Culberson

customer_reviews.title: Most drinks ever made at a barbecue
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was a little crazy paying $5oo dollars for this machine. Well considering that it all started out when I was looking for a new blender. I realized we just use it for making drinks at our parties. I heard about this drink machine and saw such great reviews, let me give it a try. Well all I can tell you is that it was a huge hit. Drinks came out perfect. It was a real pleasure to make three different kinds of drinks at once. Kids loved virgin Pinas and people were amazed at how this machine worked. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jguagman

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The Margaritaville is perfect for a party of adults and children. Kids have their own marked blender and adults have theirs. Don’t have to constantly wash and wait for blender.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Thurman

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely the coolest. It makes three pictures of whatever you want at a touch of a button
customer_reviews.author: Jnjnapping

customer_reviews.title: Frozen Party Time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for our 25th wedding anniversary. She loves it and can't believe it took me so long to get it for her. It keeps a small gathering in great drinks all night long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s a dope machine and really easy to take care of
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Fiori III

customer_reviews.title: Makes parties easy
customer_reviews.text: Best product I know for making a variety of concoctions all at once
customer_reviews.author: Jerry estrada

customer_reviews.title: Made our summer of 2013 fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I purchased this summer! So much fun, easy to use, operate and clean. From lazy Sunday afternoon's by the pool to fabulous engagement party of 100 this maker did it all without a problem. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Collichio

customer_reviews.title: looove it!  bring on summer!!
customer_reviews.text: this is the best thing next to the drink mixer. always a hit, conversation piece, and makes the best drinks! when i saw this after the price drop, it was a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Billie Athanas

customer_reviews.title: The drinks that it makes are just like the ones you get from the bar
customer_reviews.text: The Margarita Maker surpassed our expectations. The drinks that it makes are just like the ones you get from the bar. Very easy to operate and is able to keep up with a large crowd. It was a hit at our end of summer BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Patters

customer_reviews.title: Great idea buying this model
customer_reviews.text: This thing still makes me smile every time we use it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Margaritaville
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a housewarming gift for my son, I can tell you with no hesitation that this was a good gift. My sons friends call this the Margarita Robot. It is great for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Delfina Monreal

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: OMG my husband bought this for us and we LOVE LOVE LOVE it. My husband isn't normally a heavy drinker but he drinks at least 4-5 Times a week. And our friends loved it so much they bought one for themselves. We save so much money drinking at home.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a all around great product to have in your kitchen !!!
customer_reviews.author: 1Shrt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties or just to use at home
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for parties or just to use at home. Love being able to make three drinks at a time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Spanos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: loved this product . we used it for many pool events
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: larger than i expected and holds a considerable amount of ice before a need to refill
customer_reviews.author: Dean Gaither

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative to say exactly what I needed to entertain my guest
customer_reviews.author: Mr B

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I Like that you can make three different drinks at the same time. Easy to clean and very iser friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Like others have said this machine is great
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said this machine is great. It is amazingly simple to use and even easier to clean up. Since having this wonderful machine our neighbors and family have been able to enjoy perfectly made drinks whenever they like. Very easy to make alcohol free drinks and slushies for the kids. Would definitely recommend this for anyone who enjoys a frozen beverage.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Singh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I have every purchased. Don't have a party without one!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Conner

customer_reviews.title: It is quite large so u need a big counter space.
customer_reviews.text: I am a bartender with thirty years expierence. I ordered this for my own patio bar. I truly love it. It makes frozen drink making so easy and fun. !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I dont like the pitcher size
customer_reviews.text: I dont like the pitcher size, very small so it is very messy and hard to clean. i like that we can make three different kinds at once.
customer_reviews.author: susan rice

customer_reviews.title: but it was a great hit. Trust me
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, so far we've only used it twice; but it was a great hit. Trust me... you'll be impressed to see this thing in action. It's the life of the party, once you get your recipes down right. It includes guideline recipes... but you'll need to tweak them to your liking. I suggest changing the initial ingredients and sticking to the automatic settings on the device. It allows you to add shaved ice and manually blend, which is fantastic; but I'd rather just press the button.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have and use occasionally. Can't really handle a ton of work at once. Little complicated to allow "untrained" people at a party to just walk up and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the hit of the party! Delivery was quick and it works wonderfully! Margaritas, Daquaries and Virgin daquaries kept everyone cooled and entertained! I just ordered some blue Icee juice and can't wait to make "Icee"s with my grandsons!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Sneddon

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it cause it will do what it do WELL!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who sees it is amazed with what it can do. There is only one thing I don't like about it and it is the drip factor...meaning the residual dripping after it is finished. This leads to dripping on the area after the container/jar is removed for pooring (minor little quirk). You can even charge a rental fee to friends and relatives who would like to borrow it for events/gatherings/special occasions. It is worth the $$$ you spend!
customer_reviews.author: luckyducky

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: We have an annual Luau and this was the PERFECT addition to celebrate our 10yr. anniversary! It was a birthday gift for my husband. It is very durable, easy to use and great! We are very impressed with the quality and it has exceeded our expectations!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Facione

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The highlight of EVERY party!! Everyone comments the drinks are mixed PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.author: tia

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought - and I had high expectations
customer_reviews.text: We have used this multiple times for ourselves and guests and it works flawlessly! Really easy to use and clean - which is a definite plus. Sturdy mixing containers are well made but be careful when cleaning as the mixer blades are incredibly sharp. Highly recommend even if you don't entertain very often - mix one drink for you and a different drink for your wife/husband/friend.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever and it was delivered on time and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Spittler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It leaked and kept getting stuck and had to return
customer_reviews.author: stalls245

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love it. Once we got the hang of it. It is well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Oops! My daughter didn't have room for it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter and soon-to-be husband. At this time, she didn't feel they had room or accommodations for the size of the appliance. She returned the item, but will repurchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! I had a party in July 2010 with approximatly 70 people. The machine works beautifully. So easy to use. Makes wonderful drinks and a great coversational piece. We had a lot of fun with the blender trying different drinks and people really enjoyed working the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Party Girls

customer_reviews.title: Unique appliance.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. It mixes drinks and shaves ice to make all kinds of concoctions. It is a little large to keep on counter and somewhat heavy to move around. But overall the drinks come out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine but wished the melted ice reservoir was larger.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn

customer_reviews.title: We have really enjoyed our machine throughout the Christmas season
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed our machine throughout the Christmas season. We had non-alcohol drinks and drinks with alcohol going at the same time. Clean-up was easy. Everyone was happy. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: MAMA DUCK

customer_reviews.title: Best Camping Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Drinks for everyone, non-alcoholic smoothies for the kids, & the best frozen drinks after a day at the lake. Definite conversation piece!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must have during those hot BBQs. May even think about renting out to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Vazzquez-John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the adult beverages and perfect for the little ones snow cones.
customer_reviews.author: Marney Engelgau

customer_reviews.title: I like this machine very well
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine very well . I was renting a machine from distributing company will save me 400.00 dollars a year great machines
customer_reviews.author: Al Keown need warranty work  pitchers has play in the gear on bottom of pitchers/. I bought extende.

customer_reviews.title: We love it, works awesome and when company comes they ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for wife's Mother's Day present. I am a hero!! We love it, works awesome and when company comes they are facinated watching it, pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Works Great!!!! Do not hesitate buy it immediately !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I could give this a negative -4 star review. Product works when it feels like. The first time after trying for about two weeks to get this to work and ready to return, it finally started. Went to make my second drink and nothing happened. I did not touch anything, only added ingredients to the blender portion. The ice will not shave. The top was connected properly. I heard the click and the lights came on. It's an awful waste of money. Especially considering that I had to pay and extra 50% duty to my country just to bring it in. This product is highly undependable and will embarrass you.
customer_reviews.author: Keith &.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is terrific! For anyone who has ever used a standard blender to try and make frozen cocktails, you know it's nearly impossible to get the ice to the right consistency. This machine does it perfectly. Truly simple to use. Put your mix and liquor into the blender, fill the top with ice and hit start. Perfect every time. One of my concerns before buying it was how hard would it be to clean it. In a word; simple. Put the blender components in the top rack of the dishwasher and empty and dry out the ice hopper and you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G. West

customer_reviews.title: Frozen drink maker
customer_reviews.text: This was an instant hit with the family. They love making slushy's, snow cones, and frozen fruit drinks. It is great on those hot summer days. It also makes very good frozen adult beverages also. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!! Have used it several times & LOVE it. All my friends want one!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Ashenfelter

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. We rented a cottage this summer and had friends come and go. All of them looked at this thing like it came from the future and it put a smile on everyones face. Yes, it's pricey but after using it day and night for two weeks it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JimC

customer_reviews.title: tahiti frozen concoction maker
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine! Well made and VERY EASY to operate!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie F.

customer_reviews.title: My husband bought this machine for me and I LOVE It, my favorite drink is a strawberry daiquiri
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this machine for me and I LOVE It, my favorite drink is a strawberry daiquiri, and I love ordering them when we go out. NOW I don't have to go out to have a strawberry daiquiri I just need to get the "Margaritaville frozen Concoction machine" out and within a few mins there it is, very easy to use. Can't wait to use it this summer when we have pool parities.
customer_reviews.author: Ann A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This makes the best frozen drinks! My daughter even makes snowballs with it and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This item is of high quality, It does a very good job and the clean up is really easy. I would not have any con's if it wasn't for the short cord, around 20 inches. I would still recommend this to anyone. all of my guest's loved it
customer_reviews.author: PEZMANZ28

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, everything it said it was. Makes great frozen drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Rcco345

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item- have used already with great success
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item- have used already with great success. Great for our new outdoor pool living space
customer_reviews.author: Brasstrumpeter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and also fun to watch it make great drinks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this machine I use it a lot however mold ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine I use it a lot however mold has grown in the bottom : ( Please everyone check your pitchers. Twist off bottom of pitcher remove blade and black rubber and you may find mold on bottom cap between clear plastic and beige as seen in pics below So upset I called customer service, but I don't think they knew about problem and I won't use again until new pitchers are made
customer_reviews.author: N. Printz

customer_reviews.title: The only thing bad about this machine is that it is very hard ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing bad about this machine is that it is very hard to clean. The top piece that connects to the pitchers, should be a removable piece. Also, make sure not to fill the pitchers past the second line, or you will have a huge mess on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Taraska

product_meta.title: Margaritaville Tahiti Frozen Concoction Maker, DM3000
product_meta.description: Size:19.70 x 19.60 x 19.20 InchesThe Margaritaville Tahiti Frozen Concoction Maker is your passport to take your next party to the islands! With three independent blending stations, the Tahiti offers the ultimate in frozen drink making for your biggest bash, blending a variety of restaurant-quality frozen drinks at the press of a button. The Tahiti features three separate blending jars and six automated drink settings, pre-programmed to shave ice and blend the perfect Margaritas, Daiquiris, Coladas, Mudslides, Mojitos and Smoothies. The Tahiti”s rotating ice chute will entertain your guests and become the hot topic of conversation long after the party ends. And, the Tahiti is incredibly easy to use. Simply fill the top reservoir with ice, pour your favorite ingredients into the blending jars and, with the touch of a button, the automatic Shave-N-Blend controls create up to 72 ounces of pitcher-perfect frozen drink deliciousness in one easy step. The shaved ice is the key to restaurant-quality drink consistency - no more ice chunks or watered down drinks. The Tahiti manual controls also allow you to thicken or thin your drink to your personal preference with the “shave only” and “blend only” settings at each blending station. A large capacity ice reservoir holds enough ice to make up to 144 ounces of frozen drinks and heavy-duty die cast components keep the party going. Melting ice is channeled into a rear reservoir to avoid watered-down drinks. All the blending jar components are dishwasher safe, and the rest of the unit quickly wipes clean. The Tahiti will be the center of attention at your next party, featuring premium brushed nickel housing, polished stainless steel accents and bamboo wood detailing. The Margaritaville Tahiti Frozen Concoction Maker is your escape to paradise!
feature_bullets: Three 24-ounce blending jars automatically creates of 72-ounce of frozen drink per cycle
Capability to create 6+ different drink types (margarita, daiquiri, colada, mudslide, mojito, smoothie)
Rotating ice chute creates spectacle appeal
Constructed from premium bamboo wood and brushed aluminum finishes, polished stainless steel accents and heavy duty die-cast components
Measures 19.34 inches by 19.5 inches by 19.5 inches; Limited 1-year warranty.700-watts of combined blending & shaving power
